name: Verify Neuros Lore: Ladagocia
description: Validates that the 'Ladagocia' command returns the correct lore text.
testObjective: Ensure typing 'Ladagocia' returns the expected narrative text about the planet.
author: Dominic Brooks

steps.expected: Prints text: 'Ladagocia: Planet. When the Fabricans first set foot on another world, it was this lush forest planet. Their they found a fruit the locals called Pimta.' (Note typo 'Their').
